llm_text:
Why: The model flagged this transaction primarily because payment_format_ach (value=1) strongly increased the score (SHAP +2.94586). Larger transaction size—amount_received (19753.5) —also increased the score (SHAP +0.806184). The payment occurred on dayofweek (6 = Sunday), which raised the score (SHAP +0.68572), and the payment_currency_saudi_riyal (value=1) further increased risk (SHAP +0.458878). Partially offsetting these was from_bank (118) which decreased the score (SHAP −0.451851).

Conclusion: The model’s rationale is that an ACH payment (payment_format_ach=1) in Saudi Riyals of ~19,753.5 on day 6 drove the alert, with the sending bank (from_bank=118) reducing but not eliminating the signal. If ACH payments of this currency/amount on day 6 are atypical for this profile, further manual review is warranted.
